venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description: Ghost-hunting is an ongoing thing, and the amount of evidence we accumulate doesn't always make it to the public in any kind of reliable way. The KRI Center is reserving the 3rd Friday of every month so groups - ANY group - can show investigation results from the things they've done and get open feedback! What have you found? Let's see it!
item.name: Evidence reviews!
